body:
Hi Brajesh,


Look into the obj2mesh program.  It does most of what you need.  There is an earlier thread (at least one) on how to map UV coordinates.  See:


	http://www.radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2006-February/003400.html


Cheers,
-Greg
